description: Enterprise techniques used by Hannotog, ATT&CK software S1211 (v1.0)
name: Hannotog (S1211)

techniques.comment: [Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) can upload encyrpted data for exfiltration.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
[Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) can execute various `cmd.exe /c %s` commands.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
[Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) creates a new service for persistence.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
[Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) can modify local firewall settings via `netsh` commands to open a listening UDP port.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
[Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) can download additional files to the victim machine.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
[Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) uses non-standard listening ports, such as UDP 5900, for command and control purposes.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
[Hannotog](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1211) can stop Windows services.(Citation: Symantec Bilbug 2022)
